title: Замок из песка
overview: How to survive if nothing is left? Is it possible to start life anew in a strange city where no one needs you? How to find the strength to go further and not let circumstances and your own fears break you? The life of Marina Romanova was like a fairy tale, which every woman dreams of - a loving husband, little son, a country house and a successful business. But in the yard the end of the 90s, and a difficult time makes its own adjustments. Marina's beautiful life disappears in one moment, just as an incoming wave washes away a wonderful sand castle ...
